history.title: About Pickering Casino Resort
items: Up to 2,500 CAD new player bonus
history.description2: Pickering Casino Resort is a modern entertainment complex combining gaming, luxury accommodation, and fine dining. The casino features a wide range of slot machines and live dealer table games. Guests enjoy 24/7 entertainment, generous bonuses, and the chance to win big jackpots. Conveniently located near Toronto, it’s a popular destination for leisure and fun. Concerts, shows, and events are regularly hosted on-site.
history.description3: The atmosphere blends Vegas-style excitement with Canadian comfort. It’s the perfect spot for thrill-seekers and relaxation lovers alike.

customHtml.title: Welcome to the world of thrill and comfort
customHtml.description:
Pickering Casino Resort is a modern resort complex located just minutes from Toronto. It combines the excitement of Vegas, the luxury of a hotel, and a wide range of culinary experiences. The casino offers 24/7 access to over two thousand slot machines, dozens of live dealer tables, and electronic games. Whether you enjoy classic slots, poker, or sports betting, there’s something for everyone.


The resort’s hotel features spacious rooms and suites with panoramic views, kitchenettes, and all the amenities for a comfortable stay. Guests can enjoy the pool, jacuzzi, sauna, fitness center, and business facilities. The hotel is also pet-friendly, offering designated floors for guests traveling with pets.


The resort features a variety of restaurants and bars, including the Copperhorn Meet House steakhouse, Zio’s Italian pizzeria, and Sun Express Asian café. Guests can also enjoy Starbucks®, the M Cha Bar sushi spot, and Rock House Grill for everyday meals. All venues accept loyalty program reward points.


The resort’s entertainment arena regularly hosts concerts, shows, and special events. Guests can purchase tickets in advance and gain access to exclusive offers through the Great Canadian Rewards loyalty program. This program allows members to earn points through gameplay, enjoy complimentary meals, receive hotel discounts, and get invitations to members-only events.


Pickering Casino Resort is more than just a casino — it’s a full-fledged destination for leisure and experiences. It blends gaming, comfort, dining, and entertainment into one perfect place for relaxation, socializing, and unforgettable moments. Every visit here becomes a memorable event.


Visitor Guidelines for Pickering Casino Resort

Visiting Pickering Casino Resort is an exciting experience that comes with a few important rules. The casino aims to provide a safe, respectful, and enjoyable environment for all guests. Before your visit, it’s essential to understand the basic requirements to ensure a smooth and pleasant stay.


Entry Requirements:

  • • Entry is allowed only for guests 19 years and older with valid government-issued ID.
  • • The casino is open 24/7, including holidays.
  • • Smoking is permitted only in designated areas.
  • • Entry with weapons, illegal substances, or aggressive behavior is strictly prohibited.
  • • Management reserves the right to refuse entry or remove guests who violate the rules.

Dress Code

  • • Clothing must be neat, clean, and appropriate.
  • • Torn clothing, athletic wear, beachwear, flip-flops, and offensive slogans are not allowed.
  • • Casual attire is acceptable during the day, but more formal wear is preferred in the evening.
  • • Men are encouraged to wear collared shirts, trousers, and dress shoes, while women may opt for dresses, blouses, skirts, or tailored pants.

Great Canadian Rewards Loyalty Program

The Great Canadian Rewards loyalty program at Pickering Casino Resort offers a unique opportunity for regular guests to enjoy extra perks, bonuses, and exclusive offers. Membership is completely free, and registration is available both online and at the Guest Services desk. The program is valid across all 12 Great Canadian Entertainment properties in Ontario, including Pickering Casino Resort, and allows members to earn points through gaming activity that can be redeemed for free play, dining, and hotel stays.


Members gain access to special promotions, hotel discounts, priority ticket booking for concerts and events, and invitations to exclusive VIP experiences. The program includes multiple tiers, determined by the number of Tier Credits earned, which reset every six months. The higher the tier, the greater the benefits.


Program Benefits

  • • Free registration with instant access to rewards
  • • Discounts on hotels, restaurants, and events
  • • Free Slot Play earned through gameplay
  • • Invitations to exclusive promotions and VIP events
  • • Access to special offers via mobile app

Reward Currency & Tiers

  • • Reward Points — earned on slots and electronic tables, 100 points = 1 CAD Slot Play
  • • Comp Dollars — earned on all gaming activity, redeemable at amenities
  • • Tier Credits — determine membership level (reset every 6 months)

Membership Levels:

  • • Club — basic level
  • • Preferred — enhanced rewards
  • • Elite — priority access and personalized offers
  • • Summit — top-tier benefits and VIP service

customHtml_2.title: Entertainment and Gaming at Pickering Casino Resort
customHtml_2.description:
Special Bonuses and Seasonal Offers at Pickering Casino Resort

In addition to its loyalty program, Pickering Casino Resort regularly delights guests with generous bonuses, big wins, and themed events. The casino offers both online and in-person promotions, including welcome packages, seasonal tournaments, holiday giveaways, and exclusive offers for new and returning players. Entertainment shows, culinary festivals, and themed nights make visiting the resort not just thrilling, but also culturally enriching.


Players can enjoy registration bonuses, free spins, participate in progressive jackpot tournaments, and win real cash. Seasonal events like Halloween Party, Winter Jackpot Festival, or Summer Spin Series feature raffles, gifts, and free play. The online platform also provides exclusive bonuses available only to registered users.


Sample Bonuses and Offers

  • • Drops & Wins — monthly tournaments with prize pools up to 6.3M CAD
  • • Welcome Bonus — up to 450% on deposit + 400 free spins for online registration
  • • Seasonal Promotions — e.g., Halloween Spin & Win with prizes up to 25,000 CAD
  • • Slot Tournaments — free entry with chances to win Slot Play or Comp Dollars
  • • Holiday Giveaways — Christmas, New Year, and Canada Day raffles with gifts and bonuses
  • • Exclusive Online Games — featuring progressive jackpots and fast payouts
  • • Entertainment Shows — concert tickets available through promotional participation

Popular Games at Pickering Casino Resort

Pickering Casino Resort offers one of the most diverse gaming floors in Ontario, featuring over 2,200 slot machines, 90+ live table games, and a modern poker room. Guests can enjoy classic slots and the latest video games with progressive jackpots. Table game enthusiasts will find a wide selection including blackjack, roulette, Ultimate Texas Hold’em, and baccarat. The poker room operates 24/7 and hosts tournaments with various buy-in levels, including high-stakes and exclusive formats.


Electronic tables allow players to enjoy their favorite games in a digital format with live dealer interaction. The casino also features VIP areas for high rollers and special tournaments with large prizes. The Pickering Casino Online platform complements the in-person experience, offering access to slots, live games, and fast payouts.


Most Popular Games

  • • Slots: Fa-Fa Twins, SugarPop 2, Bamboo Rush, Zeus, Crazy Bot, Da Ji Da Li
  • • Jackpots: progressive wins up to 6.3M CAD
  • • Table Games: blackjack, roulette, baccarat, craps, Three Card Poker
  • • Poker: Texas Hold’em & Omaha, stakes from $1/$3 to $25/$50, tournaments from $200 to $1000 buy-in
  • • Electronic Games: virtual blackjack, roulette, baccarat with live dealers
  • • Online Games: Sweet Bonanza, Crazy Time, Aviator, with bonuses and free spins

Betting Limits at Pickering Casino Resort

Pickering Casino Resort offers flexible betting conditions suitable for both beginners and seasoned players. Guests can start with low-stakes games and gradually move to higher limits, especially in VIP areas and the poker room. The casino features a wide variety of slots, table games, and poker formats with diverse betting ranges, making it accessible to all types of players.


Game Type Minimum Bet Maximum Bet
Slots 0.01 CAD 100 CAD
Roulette 2 CAD 2,000 CAD
Blackjack 5 CAD 5,000 CAD
Baccarat 10 CAD 10,000 CAD
Poker (NLH) 1/3 CAD 25/50 CAD (on request)
Omaha (Limit) 20/40 CAD ½ Kill
Electronic Games 1 CAD 500 CAD

Entertainment and Events at Pickering Casino Resort

Pickering Casino Resort is not just about gaming — it’s a vibrant hub of year-round entertainment, shows, and special events. The centerpiece of its entertainment offerings is The Arena, a state-of-the-art venue equipped with cutting-edge sound and lighting. It hosts concerts by international and Canadian artists, theatrical performances, comedy nights, and themed parties. Regular shows include tribute acts, pop and rock concerts, and seasonal productions like “Elvis Wonderful World of Christmas” and “Grease Live”.


The resort also features seasonal events such as Halloween parties, Christmas shows, spring culinary festivals, and summer music series. Guests can purchase tickets in advance via Ticketmaster or gain access through promotional participation. Evening entertainment includes live music in bars, DJ sets, and themed nights, especially on weekends. While there isn’t a dedicated nightclub, the atmosphere in lounges and restaurants often mirrors a club vibe — with dancing, cocktails, and live performances.


For those seeking a more relaxed experience, the resort offers culinary evenings, wine tastings, cooking classes, and chef meet-and-greets. The casino collaborates with performers and organizers to deliver unique formats — from stand-up comedy to retro parties. All events are held in a safe and comfortable setting, with VIP seating options available.


Featured Entertainment & Events

  • • The Arena — main stage for concerts, shows, and performances
  • • Concerts — Nate Smith, Brit Floyd, Dallas Smith, Smokey Robinson, ABBA Revisited, Human Nature
  • • Tribute Shows — Hotel California (Eagles), Grease Live, Elvis Christmas Special
  • • Comedy Nights — Larry the Cable Guy, Phil Rosenthal
  • • Seasonal Events — Halloween Party, Christmas Gala, Summer Music Series
  • • Live Music in Bars — DJ sets, acoustic performances, themed nights
  • • Culinary Experiences — tastings, festivals, cooking classes
  • • VIP Entertainment — private parties, artist meetups, premium seating

Dining, Bars & Relaxation at Pickering Casino Resort

Pickering Casino Resort is not just about gaming and shows — it’s a full-scale retreat offering high-end comfort and relaxation. The resort hotel features spacious rooms and suites with panoramic windows, kitchenettes, and modern amenities. Guests can unwind at the Aquatic Oasis, which includes a pool, jacuzzi, sauna, and steam room. A fitness center, business area, and free parking are also available. The hotel is pet-friendly, with designated floors for guests traveling with pets.


The resort hosts 6 restaurants and 3 bars, each offering a unique atmosphere and menu. From a premium steakhouse to Asian cuisine, Italian pizza, sushi, and bubble tea — there’s something for every taste. In the evenings, bars transform into lounge zones with live music, cocktails, and DJ sets, creating a nightclub-like vibe. All venues accept loyalty program reward points, making the experience even more enjoyable.


Dining & Relaxation Venues

  • • Copperhorn Meet House — premium steakhouse with signature dishes
  • • Rock House Grill — everyday favorites: burgers, chicken, salads
  • • Zio’s — Italian pizza, including truffle and classic styles
  • • Sun Express — Asian cuisine: noodles, rice, soups, bubble tea
  • • M Cha Bar — sushi, poke bowls, fruit and milk teas
  • • Starbucks® — coffee, desserts, snacks
  • • Hotel Bar — cocktails, wine, beer, lounge vibe
  • • Lounge Areas — evening music, DJs, dancing
  • • Aquatic Oasis — pool, jacuzzi, sauna, steam room
  • • Fitness Center — cardio and strength equipment
  • • Business Zone — workspaces, Wi-Fi, conference rooms

items.title: What payment methods are accepted?
items.answer: Cash, credit/debit cards (Visa, MasterCard), and Comp Dollars.

items.title: What languages are supported?
items.answer: English is primary; staff may assist in French and other languages.

items.title: Can I bring a pet?
items.answer: Yes, the hotel offers pet-friendly floors.

items.title: Is there a nightclub?
items.answer: No dedicated club, but bars and lounges offer evening entertainment.
